t: What I have learned after a year with the La Pavoni
s: It's been 15 months since we got our La Pavoni from Amazon and we've made an average of 2-3 shots a day since then. Affogatos, coffee over ice, lattes, americanos... this machine gets serious use and is one of the best purchases we've ever made. That said, I've never purchased anything that ...
